kv2.1:1.3.pli: Atthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?

kv2.1:2.1.pli: Natthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?

kv2.1:2.3.pli: Hañci natthi arahato rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:3.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, atthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ kāmogho kāmayogo kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?

kv2.1:3.3.pli: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, atthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ …pe… kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?

kv2.1:4.1.pli: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, natthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ …pe… kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?

kv2.1:4.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, natthi tassa rāgo kāmarāgo kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhānaṃ …pe… kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti?

kv2.1:5.4.pli: Handa hi mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti.

kv2.1:6.1.pli: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?

kv2.1:7.3.pli: Hañci natthi mārakāyikānaṃ devatānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:8.1.pli: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?

kv2.1:8.3.pli: Mārakāyikā devatā attano asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharanti, aññesaṃ asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharanti, tassa asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?

kv2.1:9.1.pli: Mārakāyikā devatā neva attano na aññesaṃ na tassa asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?

kv2.1:9.3.pli: Hañci mārakāyikā devatā neva attano na aññesaṃ na tassa asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:10.1.pli: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?

kv2.1:11.1.pli: Mārakāyikā devatā arahato asuciṃ sukkavissaṭṭhiṃ upasaṃharantīti?

kv2.1:12.3.pli: Atthi arahato satthari vimati, dhamme vimati, saṅghe vimati, sikkhāya vimati, pubbante vimati, aparante vimati, pubbantāparante vimati, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?

kv2.1:13.1.pli: Natthi arahato satthari vimati, dhamme vimati, saṅghe vimati, sikkhāya vimati, pubbante vimati, aparante vimati, pubbantāparante vimati, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?

kv2.1:13.3.pli: Hañci natthi arahato satthari vimati …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:14.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa vimati, atthi tassa satthari vimati …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?

kv2.1:14.3.pli: Atthi arahato vimati, atthi tassa satthari vimati …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?

kv2.1:15.1.pli: Atthi arahato vimati, natthi tassa satthari vimati …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?

kv2.1:15.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa vimati, natthi tassa satthari vimati …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu vimatīti?

kv2.1:16.7.pli: Ye keci asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, sabbesaṃyeva atthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:17.1.pli: Ye keci asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, sabbesaṃyeva atthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:17.3.pli: Dārakā asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, atthi dārakānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:18.1.pli: Paṇḍakā asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, atthi paṇḍakānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:19.1.pli: Devā asanti pivanti khādanti sāyanti, atthi devatānaṃ asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:21.1.pli: Arahato uccārapassāvo asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, atthi tassa āsayoti?

kv2.1:21.3.pli: Arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, atthi tassa āsayoti?

kv2.1:22.1.pli: Arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, natthi tassa āsayoti?

kv2.1:22.3.pli: Arahato uccārapassāvo asitapītakhāyitasāyitassa nissando, natthi tassa āsayoti?

kv2.1:23.3.pli: Arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?

kv2.1:24.1.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, puthujjano methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?

kv2.1:24.3.pli: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?

kv2.1:25.1.pli: Atthi arahato asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, na ca arahā methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?

kv2.1:25.3.pli: Atthi puthujjanassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, na ca puthujjano methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyya, methunaṃ uppādeyya, puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyya, kāsikacandanaṃ paccanubhaveyya, mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhāreyya, jātarūparajataṃ sādiyeyyāti?

kv2.1:26.3.pli: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammoti?

kv2.1:26.5.pli: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:27.11.pli: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti?

kv2.1:27.13.pli: Hañci arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṅkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammaṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:28.5.pli: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya maggo bhāvito, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:29.10.pli: Hañci arahato rāgappahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:30.8.pli: Hañci arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:31.3.pli: Nanu arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññāvimutto ukkhittapaligho saṅkiṇṇaparikho abbūḷhesiko niraggaḷo ariyo pannaddhajo pannabhāro visaññutto suvijitavijayo, dukkhaṃ tassa pariññātaṃ, samudayo pahīno, nirodho sacchikato, maggo bhāvito, abhiññeyyaṃ abhiññātaṃ, pariññeyyaṃ pariññātaṃ, pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ, bhāvetabbaṃ bhāvitaṃ, sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikatanti?

kv2.1:31.5.pli: Hañci arahā vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho katakaraṇīyo …pe…

kv2.1:31.6.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:32.2.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhi, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti.

kv2.1:34.1.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:34.3.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:35.3.pli: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:35.5.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:36.6.pli: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:36.8.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:37.2.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:37.5.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, atthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:38.1.pli: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:38.3.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:39.3.pli: anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:39.5.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṃ pahīnaṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:40.6.pli: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:40.8.pli: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:41.2.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:41.5.pli: sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikataṃ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?

kv2.1:42.4.pli: “ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puthujjanā sīlasampannā satā sampajānā niddaṃ okkamanti, tesaṃ asuci na muccati.

kv2.1:42.5.pli: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bāhirakā isayo kāmesu vītarāgā, tesampi asuci na muccati.

kv2.1:42.6.pli: Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṃ arahato asuci mucceyyā”ti.

kv2.1:43.6.pli: Hañci arahato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ pare upasaṃhareyyuṃ, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv2.1:44.1.pli: Arahato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ pare upasaṃhareyyunti, atthi arahato parūpahāroti?

kv2.1:44.3.pli: Arahato sotāpattiphalaṃ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ vā anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arahattaṃ vā pare upasaṃhareyyunti?

kv2.10:1.3.pli: Lokuttare sote paṭihaññati no lokiye, lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti no lokiyena, sāvakā paṭivijānanti no puthujjanāti?

kv2.10:2.1.pli: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññatīti?

kv2.10:2.3.pli: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiye sote paṭihaññati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:3.1.pli: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānantīti?

kv2.10:3.3.pli: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:4.1.pli: Nanu buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ puthujjanā paṭivijānantīti?

kv2.10:4.3.pli: Hañci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:5.3.pli: Maggo phalaṃ nibbānaṃ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṃ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṃ, satipaṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ iddhipādo indriyaṃ balaṃ bojjhaṅgoti?

kv2.10:6.3.pli: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇantīti?

kv2.10:6.5.pli: Lokuttaro dhammo sotaviññeyyo, sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati, sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?

kv2.10:7.1.pli: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti?

kv2.10:7.3.pli: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na sotaviññeyyo, na sotasmiṃ paṭihaññati, na sotassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:8.3.pli: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre rajjeyyunti?

kv2.10:8.5.pli: Lokuttaro dhammo rāgaṭṭhāniyo rajanīyo kamanīyo madanīyo bandhanīyo mucchanīyoti?

kv2.10:9.1.pli: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyoti?

kv2.10:9.3.pli: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na rāgaṭṭhāniyo na rajanīyo na kamanīyo na madanīyo na bandhanīyo na mucchanīyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:10.3.pli: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre dusseyyunti?

kv2.10:11.1.pli: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyoti?

kv2.10:11.3.pli: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na dosaṭṭhāniyo na kopaṭṭhāniyo na paṭighaṭṭhāniyo, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:12.3.pli: Atthi keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāre muyheyyunti?

kv2.10:12.5.pli: Lokuttaro dhammo mohaṭṭhāniyo aññāṇakaraṇo acakkhukaraṇo paññānirodhiko vighātapakkhiko anibbānasaṃvattanikoti?

kv2.10:13.1.pli: Nanu lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṃvattanikoti?

kv2.10:13.3.pli: Hañci lokuttaro dhammo na mohaṭṭhāniyo na aññāṇakaraṇo na acakkhukaraṇo paññāvuddhiko avighātapakkhiko nibbānasaṃvattaniko, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:14.3.pli: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventīti?

kv2.10:15.1.pli: Ye keci buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, sabbe te maggaṃ bhāventīti?

kv2.10:15.3.pli: Bālaputhujjanā buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇanti, bālaputhujjanā maggaṃ bhāventīti?

kv2.10:15.9.pli: saṅghabhedako buddhassa bhagavato vohāraṃ suṇāti, saṅghabhedako maggaṃ bhāvetīti?

kv2.10:16.1.pli: Labbhā sovaṇṇamayāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?

kv2.10:16.3.pli: Evamevaṃ bhagavā lokuttarena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharatīti.

kv2.10:17.1.pli: Labbhā elaṇḍiyāya laṭṭhiyā dhaññapuñjopi suvaṇṇapuñjopi ācikkhitunti?

kv2.10:17.3.pli: Evamevaṃ bhagavā lokiyena vohārena lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharatīti.

kv2.10:18.1.pli: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?

kv2.10:18.3.pli: Lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiye sote paṭihaññati, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttare sote paṭihaññati;

kv2.10:18.4.pli: lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttarena viññāṇena paṭivijānanti;

kv2.10:18.5.pli: lokiyaṃ voharantassa puthujjanā paṭivijānanti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa sāvakā paṭivijānantīti?

kv2.10:19.2.pli: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti?

kv2.10:19.4.pli: Nanu bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharatīti?

kv2.10:19.6.pli: Hañci bhagavā lokiyampi lokuttarampi dhammaṃ voharati, tena vata re vattabbe—

kv2.10:19.7.pli: “buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotī”ti.

kv2.10:20.1.pli: Buddhassa bhagavato vohāro lokiyaṃ voharantassa lokiyo hoti, lokuttaraṃ voharantassa lokuttaro hotīti?

kv2.10:20.3.pli: Maggaṃ voharantassa maggo hoti, amaggaṃ voharantassa amaggo hoti, phalaṃ voharantassa phalaṃ hoti, aphalaṃ voharantassa aphalaṃ hoti, nibbānaṃ voharantassa nibbānaṃ hoti, anibbānaṃ voharantassa anibbānaṃ hoti, saṅkhataṃ voharantassa saṅkhataṃ hoti, asaṅkhataṃ voharantassa asaṅkhataṃ hoti, rūpaṃ voharantassa rūpaṃ hoti, arūpaṃ voharantassa arūpaṃ hoti, vedanaṃ voharantassa vedanā hoti, avedanaṃ voharantassa avedanā hoti, saññaṃ voharantassa saññā hoti, asaññaṃ voharantassa asaññā hoti, saṅkhāre voharantassa saṅkhārā honti, asaṅkhāre voharantassa asaṅkhārā honti, viññāṇaṃ voharantassa viññāṇaṃ hoti, aviññāṇaṃ voharantassa aviññāṇaṃ hotīti?

kv2.11:3.3.pli: Atthi dvinnaṃ nibbānānaṃ uccanīcatā hīnapaṇītatā ukkaṃsāvakaṃso sīmā vā bhedo vā rāji vā antarikā vāti?

kv2.11:4.5.pli: Hañci appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhe saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhā nirodhenti, no ca vata re vattabbe—

kv2.11:5.4.pli: Nanu appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggā, paṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggāti?

kv2.11:5.6.pli: Hañci appaṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggā, paṭisaṅkhāniruddhāpi saṅkhārā accantabhaggā, tena vata re vattabbe—
